page.title: 19Tutbury`s new Community Ctre
page.content: Many people call it the "new Community centre" but the idea of having one isnÂ£t new at all.It all started in 1973 when a group of people came together with the idea of forming a new centre. Most of the money needed came from fetes,raffles and so on.There was even a "buy a brick" campaign in which everyone was asked to buy a brick. The centre is aimed at everyone,with sports and activities for all age groups.The position of the building is to be in Monk Street next to the Health Centre,and is expected to open in 1986. TUTBURY VILLAGE BANK It is very unusual for a village the size of Tutbury to have its own bank. It has a bit of a garden where the bank staff grow vegetables and fruit.This is unusual for a bank too.There are about two thousand people banking there and there are about five thousands accounts
